name: Spoopy Sprint
description:
Get ready for the craziest Halloween ever...

Lili knocked on the wrong door when trick-or-treating, and now she has to escape a crazy man-eating house... and maybe pick up a bit of candy on the way.


Spoopy sprint is a family-friendly runner with cute graphics and challenging gameplay. This game was made for The Game Assembly 2022 Game Project 1.

  • Graphics:
    • Beatrice Johansson
    • Elin Öhrman
    • Jesper Rudén
    • Philip McEwan
  • Level Design:
    • Emanuel Salomon
    • Henrik Andersson
    • Linus Andersson
  • Programming:
    • Anton Eriksson
    • Assar Bergh
    • Eric Hederstedt Jonsson
    • Olle Karlsson Reutercrona
    • Vilhelm Gafvelin
    • Natdanai Puthom
